sentences.en: a whole slew of cheap motels
Additional, still by outport hire whole slew tug 2.
sentences.cn: 另外, 还由外港租用了全回转拖轮2艘.

sentences.en: And they slew a bullock, and brought the child to Eli.
sentences.cn: 25宰了一只公牛, 就领孩子到以利面前.

sentences.en: At once he slew him and set Io free.
sentences.cn: 他立刻杀死了阿尔戈斯,放掉了伊俄.

sentences.en: But the easy money also brings a slew of unexpected problems.
sentences.cn: 但这容易赚入的钱也带给意外问题的扭转.

sentences.en: He slew all who dared to withstand him.
sentences.cn: 他把敢于对抗他的人都斩尽杀绝.

sentences.en: He turned their waters into blood, and slew their fish.
sentences.cn: 29他叫埃及的水变为血, 叫他们的鱼死了.

sentences.en: Listen. Do you think the paltry dozen you slew scares us?
sentences.cn: 听着, 你们是不是觉得杀几个微不足道的人就吓倒我们了?

sentences.en: Many people were slew in the war.
sentences.cn: 战争在这场战争中被屠杀.

sentences.en: Roleplaying is a powerful technique for a whole slew of reasons.
sentences.cn: 角色扮演是一种强有力的手段,为此可以举出一大堆理由.

sentences.en: Slew - Rate Limited for Error Free Data Transmission.
sentences.cn: 为无错误数据传输的(压)摆率限制.

sentences.en: The desired output information was a measure of slew - rate or angular - velocity input and not position.
sentences.cn: 所要求的陀螺输出是旋转速率或角速度输入的量度,而不是位置的量度.

sentences.en: The Shanghai team took advantage of a slew of Jiangxi turnovers.
sentences.cn: 上海队利用江西队的频繁失球占了上风.

sentences.en: There have been a whole slew of shooting incidents.

words.tran_cn: 杀害，杀死；使禁不住大笑

trans.tran_cn: 杀死，宰杀，杀戮( slay的过去式 )
trans.tran_en: to turn or slide in a different direction suddenly and violently, or to make a vehicle do this
